Daemos:
Of course. Now, can you tell me about the situation on this planet?


>From: Yanshosh@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: More Stuff :) / Najah
>Date: Mon, 02 Jul 2001 06:36:44 -0000
>
>::Zardus::
>
>Zardus nods, impressed with the robot mode as well. His mind was recieving 
>FZ's view of the creatures that Lady Hawk had created, and Zardus briefly 
>wondered if they would be as effective as this bot. Probably not, as this 
>bot had more experience.
>
>"Of course. If you can follow me to a conference room, we can talk much 
>better there," he says, half-turning and waiting for Daemos's reply.
>
>
>
>--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nicolas Marion" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Daemos:
> > Now I suppose you would have some use for me, or else you would not have
> > summoned me here. I suggest that we start talking about business now...
> > I am transformed...
> >
> > He transformed to his robot mode, standing on two wolf-like legs, four 
>wings
> > sprouting from his back and many spikes on his forearms. He was enjoying 
>the
> > fact that he had impressed Zardus and he was now eager to know what was 
>the
> > project the Alliance Leader had for him.
>
